title: Mon Dieu! Is China Now a Better Place to Do Business Than France?
text:
China now tops France in the World Bank’s latest “Doing Business” rankings and is closing in on Japan. But there is less than meets the eye to the stratospheric rise in its rank, from 78th to 31st in just three years, making it supposedly one of the easiest emerging markets in which to do business.
